definitions.definition: The collection of myths of a people , concerning the origin of the people, history , deities , ancestors and heroes .
A similar body of myths concerning an event , person or institution .
Pervasive elements of a fictional universe that resemble a mythological universe.
The set of misconceptions and false attitudes that are held about something and contribute to its perception.
The systematic collection and study of myths.

main_definition: ( countable and uncountable ) The collection of myths of a people , concerning the origin of the people, history , deities , ancestors and heroes .
secondary_definitions: ( countable and uncountable ) A similar body of myths concerning an event , person or institution .
( countable and uncountable ) Pervasive elements of a fictional universe that resemble a mythological universe.
The set of misconceptions and false attitudes that are held about something and contribute to its perception.
( uncountable ) The systematic collection and study of myths.
